entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low zero.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Fog at times overnight. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h early this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CDT Tuesday 9 May 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of rain showers in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Fog at times in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High plus 5. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CDT Tuesday 9 May 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 2. POP 30%
